title: Build digitaltokens.xyz - Token Launchpad Platform
description:
Create digitaltokens.xyz as a token launchpad and digital asset platform.

## Features
1. **Token Launchpad** - Create and launch custom tokens
2. **Loyalty Points System** - Business loyalty program tokens
3. **Gift Cards** - Digital gift card creation and redemption
4. **Token Management** - Dashboard for token holders
5. **Marketplace** - Buy/sell/trade tokens
6. **API Access** - Developer API for integrations

## Tech Stack
- Next.js frontend
- Node.js/Go backend
- PostgreSQL + Redis
- Web3 integration (ethers.js)
- Stripe for fiat payments

## Target Domain
- digitaltokens.xyz

## Related
- buildnft.xyz (existing NFT platform)
- merklemart.com (crypto marketplace)
- getthis.money (payments platform)
acceptance_criteria: Gift card creation and redemption working
testing_plan:
1. Test token creation flow
2. Test loyalty points issuance and redemption
3. Test gift card lifecycle
4. Test user authentication
5. Test API endpoints
6. Verify blockchain integrations
rollback_plan: Remove DNS records and k8s deployment if issues occur. No blockchain transactions until production-ready.
